message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000.  I'm confident you'll see its worth.
I appreciate the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm trying to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $17,000?
I appreciate the gesture, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so how about $14,000?
